title: Effective Mathematics Instructional Design in Emergency Remote Teaching Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Elementary Education Field Experience
context.additional_context: Educational design considerations for technical constraints (e.g., internet instability) in digital device-provided environments. Flexible scheduling reflecting professional characteristics

learning_goals: Participants can design tools to analyze educational effectiveness using three or more mixed research methods
Learners can develop three-stage interaction strategies for delivering math concepts in remote/in-person environments
Trainees can plan activities that engage 80% or more of learners even under technical constraints (data costs, internet accessibility)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
